description: A piece of tissue harvested from an animal.  You should either make use of it or freeze it quickly.  This one comes from Gallus gallus domesticus, or a chicken if you prefer English.
A piece of tissue harvested from an animal.  You should either make use of it or freeze it quickly.  This one comes from Columba livia domestica, or a feral pigeon if you prefer English.
A piece of tissue harvested from an animal.  You should either make use of it or freeze it quickly.  This one comes from Branta canadensis, or a Canada goose if you prefer English.
A piece of tissue harvested from an animal.  You should either make use of it or freeze it quickly.  This one comes from Struthio camelus, or an African ostrich if you prefer English.
